name: politico
text: Another Tuesday, another primary night. Here are 5️⃣ things we're watching tonight 👇 https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text:
1️⃣ Colorado:

A real slog of a month is coming to an end for John Hickenlooper, who has been getting stung by a swirl of bad headlines and his primary opponent Andrew Romanoff.
https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text: 2️⃣ And keep an eye the primaries in CO-03. In the red-leaning district, incumbent GOP Rep. Scott Tipton is facing a primary from local businesswoman Lauren Boebert. And on the Dem side, 2018 nominee Diane Mitsch Bush is facing  businessman James Iacino. https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text:
3️⃣  Oklahoma:

The big race we’re watching in the Sooner State is the GOP primary in OK-05, which is expected to be one of the most competitive House races in November. It is expected to head to an August runoff.  https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text:
4️⃣ Utah:

The GOP will effectively pick the next governor in a race that’s likely to go down to the wire. Former Gov. Jon Huntsman and Lt. Gov. Spencer Cox have been neck-and-neck in this competitive primary. 
https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text: 5️⃣ Plus there are 2 competitive GOP primaries in House seats. In UT-04, the GOP will pick a challenger to freshman Dem Rep. Ben McAdams in a hyper-competitive race in Nov. There’s also an open primary in the safe red UT-01 to replace Rep. Rob Bishop. https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa

name: politico
text:
Bonus:
We also expect to get a winner in the Kentucky Democratic Senate primary between Amy McGrath and Charles Booker today. It has been neck-and-neck so far in the votes that have been counted so far.

https://t.co/6R7DivT9wa
